actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to extend the provisions relating to the export of domestically produced crude oil.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to exempt from the termination provisions of such Act provisions relating to the export of domestically produced crude oil.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to extend the provisions relating to the export of domestically produced crude oil.
